Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Creates the "Paid-In Act"; exempts used books from sales use taxes, up to one hundred dollars per item
Summary: Exempts used books from sales use taxes including second-hand purchases, up to one hundred dollars per item.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting used books from the collection sales and use taxes
